MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.41pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:59 PM on Thursday, 25 March 2021.
